name: Season Makers
description:
Welcome to your new job at SEASON MAKERS.
Here we ship materials to build all the year seasons.
Take your place, prepare your reflexes, and work hard to deliver the parcels, while you deal with our poorest security measures on the production line!

Game submited for RhythmJam and Game Jaaj

::SOUND ISSUES::
If you have any error in music rendering, refresh the page. This should re-sync the game.

::INSTRUCTIONS::
Every time the music play a Beat (Also, when the Black Bars touch themselfs in the middle of the time line), your character will move to the slot under your mouse cursor.

When you move, you leave a trail with the Beat Color. All the colectibles with the same Beat Color will be collected. Collect enough of them to complete the level.

Keep an eye on obstacles like holes and walls, they can take you out of the production line, making you lose precious time to collect your seasonal objects.

Don't try to stay over a hole.
Don't try to dash through a wall.
